name: Block Invaders (Willy Bee)
description:
‘Block Invaders’ is a fun and conceptually interesting arcade hybrid between the games ‘Breakout’ and ‘Space Invaders’. This was a project I made in college while branching off of a Unity course I had taken online, and the idea was to see how far I could take the concepts that I had learned from the course material.

The game has three levels to beat! In each level you can gain points by:

  • Hitting the ball against colored blocks
  • Shooting enemies
  • Shooting the metal blocks near the top of the screen

To proceed to the next level, just knock out all the colored blocks with the ball! An empty health bar is equivalent to losing one life.

Controls: Mouse to aim, use Space, LMB, or RMB to shoot!

Github Repo: https://github.com/WillyBeeCoding/Block-Invaders
